messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Could you list every single concert on Taylor Swift’s official tour from January 1, 2010, to May 1, 2025, including the specific date, the concert’s English name, the country, the city, and the venue. Each show should be on its own line, in chronological order from earliest to latest.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following columns:
Date, the Concert’s English Name, Host Country, Host City, Host Venue

Notes: Do not use date ranges for Date, list it in the format of “Day Month, Year”, for example: 4th June, 2011
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To find every single concert on Taylor Swift’s official tour from January 1, 2010, to May 1, 2025, I need to gather comprehensive information about all her concerts within this period:

<search>Taylor Swift concert dates 2010-2025</search>

Search query: Taylor Swift concert dates 2010-2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Taylor_Swift_live_performances):
List of Taylor Swift live performances - Wikipedia April 23, 2009 – July 10, 2010 · February 9, 2011 – March 18, 2012 · March 13, 2013 – June 12, 2014 · May 5, 2015 – December 12, 2015 ; Fearless · Speak Now · Red.

[Doc 2](https://www.concertarchives.org/bands/taylor-swift--2):
Taylor Swift Concert & Tour History Taylor Swift Tours & Concerts ; Dec 12, 2025. Taylor Swift · House of Independents ; Oct 17, 2025. Taylor Swift · Webster Underground ; Oct 10, 2025. Private Event.

[Doc 3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-3T2npTxTN8):
Every Taylor Swift Concert, Mapped (2006-2025) - YouTube From her humble beginnings opening for country legends to the record-breaking global phenomenon of The Eras Tour, join us on a journey ...

Based on the provided information:

<search>Taylor Swift tour dates 2010-2025 venues</search>

Search query: Taylor Swift tour dates 2010-2025 venues
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Taylor_Swift_live_performances):
List of Taylor Swift live performances - Wikipedia Taylor Swift has headlined six concert tours to support her albums. She has additionally performed at festivals, awards shows, benefit concerts, and sporting ...

[Doc 2](https://www.concertarchives.org/bands/taylor-swift--2):
Taylor Swift Concert & Tour History Taylor Swift Tours & Concerts ; Dec 12, 2025. Taylor Swift · House of Independents ; Oct 17, 2025. Taylor Swift · Webster Underground ; Oct 10, 2025. Private Event.

[Doc 3](https://taylorswift.fandom.com/wiki/Tours):
Tours - Taylor Swift Wiki - Fandom The following is a list of each of Taylor Swift's concert tours. Opening. Main article: Opening act. Headlining. Fearless Tour (2009-2010) · Fearless Tour
